title: Pie Crust

ingredients.content: 2 ½ oz unsalted butter, cut into pieces

preparations.content: Place flour, butter, salt and water into mixing bowl and mix <b>20 sec/speed 4<b>. Remove pastry from mixing bowl and form into a flattened ball. Wrap in cling wrap and refrigerate until needed or use pastry as described in other recipes.

hintsAndTricks: Use pie crust for sweet or savory pies.
Unbaked pie crust freezes well. Freeze dough partially rolled out for faster defrosting in the refrigerator.

To blind bake a crust or pie shell, use a rolling pin to roll out pastry on a lightly floured surface. Line a greased quiche or pie pan with the pastry and prick with a fork to avoid air bubbles. Line pastry with parchment and fill with baking weights (e.g. rice, beans) before baking in a preheated oven (350°F) for 15 minutes. Remove parchment and baking weights and bake for a further 5 minutes or until golden brown.
